Hi!

Welcome to all our current students, former students (known as alumni) and visitors and friends. University life doesn’t end after you graduate -  you will carry Abertay with you always, and we hope this site will help you to stay in touch with us and your fellow alumni.
In these pages you will discover how Abertay has grown and how we are making our mark as one of Scotland’s leading Universities. You can also:
• get in touch with one of our Graduate Contacts
• find out about forthcoming reunions or other events
• read news of what your former classmates are doing
• find out what benefits are available to you as a member of the Graduate Association
• send a postcard to your Alumni friends

column2: • play with our Interactive Map and see what's new since you were last in Dundee.

column1: We like feedback and value your input, so if you have any questions, comments or suggestions, or would just like to say hi, please contact:
University of Abertay Dundee Communications Centre
